##What is DNA ?
> - Deoxyribonucleic acid

\bigskip

> - Genetic code that determines all the caracteristics of a living thing

\bigskip

> - Double helical structure


## What is DNA composed of:

- \color{orange} Phosphate group

\bigskip

- \color{green} Sugar

\bigskip

- \color{red} Nitrogen bases

\pagebreak
